casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 1, 2008

[Cite as 10101/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-4911.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2008-1287. State ex rel. Lofton v. Bursey.

In Mandamus. On complaint in mandamus of Lovill Lofton. On S.CtPrae.R. X(5) determination, cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Cupp, J., dissents and would grant an alternative writ.
